alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 22 at 6:04AM EST until December 23 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Heavy mixed precipitation expected towards Millinocket and Houlton. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Towards Millinocket and Houlton, sleet accumulations of around one half of an inch, and ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch expected, which will likely keep the total snow accumulations toward the lower end of the range. * WHERE...Northeast Aroostook, Northern Penobscot and Southeast Aroostook Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM Wednesday to midnight EST Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice will make travel extremely dangerous. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Southeast Aroostook
